!goal: This is a free-for-all server, there is no goal. Make some money, grow some cities, transport the most cargo, you decide!
!goals: This is a free-for-all server, there is no goal. Make some money, grow some cities, transport the most cargo, you decide!
!help: Idle companies are cleared after 4 hours. Server resets daily at 16:00 AEST/+1000.
!reset - delete your company to free up a slot
!end - how much time until the game resets
!rules: 1. Be nice & respectful of other players
3. Do not steal non-primary resources (goods, steel etc)
But most of all have fun.
